name: Leonidas

ski.name: BARBARIC TOSS
desc: Leonidas flings his blade at an enemy unit, dealing an unfixed amount of physical damage.

ski.name: WAR SHIELD
desc: Leonidas adopts different formations depending on circumstances of battle. Assault Mode - Passive: increases movement and attack speed. When switching to Assault Mode: Gains 31% bonus Movement Speed which gradually falls back to 25% within 3s; Passive buffs are doubled for 3s and Barbaric Toss deals max damage. Defense Mode - Passive: Both Movement Speed and damage taken are reduced. While switching to Defense Mode:  Reduces Movement Speed by 21% and the reduction gradually restores to 15% within 3s; Damage reduction is doubled for 3s and Barbaric Toss stuns a target for 1s.
data: Assault Mode Passive - Bonus Attack Speed: 12/18/24/30
Defense Mode Passive - Movement Speed Reduction: 15%
update: Bonus Attack Speed â†‘ Damage Reduction â†‘

ski.name: IRON WILL
desc: Increases attack and defense for Leonidas every second to a maximum of 10 stacks for 5 seconds.  Also increases Crit rate when 10+ stacks for 5 seconds.
study: Gain bonus Attack Damage, Armor and Crit
update: Attack Damage â†‘ Armor â†‘ Crit â†‘

ski.name: SAVAGE SLAY
desc: Leonidas charges at a target unit, dealing physical damage and stunning for 2 seconds.  Meanwhile, nearby enemies within 400 radius are knocked back 600 range,   dealing half physical damage and slowing movement by 30% for 3 seconds. Casting Ult grants 3 stacks of buffs.
study: Charge deals physical damage, stuns target and knocks back nearby enemy units

story: Facing the invasion of Persians, Leonidas led his country's best men fighting in the front. They fought with their lives and the Persians were exhausted at the easily-defendable Thermopylae. Their resistance bought precious time for allied forces in Athens and the evacuation of the Greek.
